00017 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00018 // Name: Substring
00019 // Desc: Return substring, starting at start and with a length of length
00020 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00021 String* String::Substring(UINT start, UINT length, String* result)
00022 {
00023         if(start < len)
00024         {
00025                 if(start + length < len)
00026                 {
00027                         size_t newlen = len - start - length;
00028                         LPTSTR newchars = new TCHAR[newlen + 1];
00029                         if(!newchars)
00030                         {
00031                                 *result = String();
00032                         }
00033                         else
00034                         {
00035                                 _tcsncpy_s(newchars, newlen + 1, chars, newlen);
00036                                 newchars[newlen] = NULL;
00037                                 *result = String(newchars);
00038                                 delete[] newchars;
00039                         }
00040                 }
00041                 else
00042                         *result = String(chars + start);
00043         }
00044         else
00045                 *result = String();
00046 
00047         return result;
00048 }
